summary: "30 Rock" is a funny TV show created by Tina Fey that aired on NBC from 2006 to 2013. It's about the behind-the-scenes drama at a fake live comedy show on NBC. The name comes from the real address of NBC Studios in New York City. The show stars Tina Fey and Alec Baldwin and uses silly humor to make fun of how big companies like NBC work. It won many awards, even though not many people watched it at first. Now, it's considered one of the best TV shows ever, with a great series finale.
title: 30 Rock
